data.name: Archery Land
data.detailed_description:
You became a warrior who was called by the goddess to protect the shrine of water.
As evening approaches, monsters aiming for the Shrine of Water appear.

Warrior!

Pass 6 ordeals to protect the shrine of water from monsters.
And become a legendary warrior who protects the shrine of water and protects the goddess by killing monsters!

Also, Be the greatest warrior in a breathtaking 1v1 battle with other warriors in the arena of Archery Land.











Features:
üéØ Battle! Become the best warrior!
üéØ Aim! Use your bow to hit a moving target!
üéØ Fire! Shoot the arrow faster than anyone else!
üéØ Please! What's the limit of my power? Throw the arrow as far as you can!
üèπ Brain at full capacity! Use all your senses to memorize!
üèπ Clear all single games to lift the boss's game!
üèπ If I catch the boss, maybe I'll get something good...?
üèÜ Collect! Improve your skills and collect all your medals!

data.short_description: Archery Land is a single, multiplayer VR shooting game, and Enjoy the thrilling feeling of hitting the target in our Archery Land by aiming the bow at the wide land.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX Vega 56 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2080 / AMD RX Vega 64
